string-array.name: faq_answers
string-array.item: Evazu is an Electronic Scooter sharing company, an eco-friendly and user friendly, this transportation will help you to reach you destination safely without any delay.
Evazu can lead you to your destination in a very short period of time, without any delay and traffic.
Paytm, Debit and Credit Cards.
The minimum age requirement is 16 and above.
Cost will depend as per km ridden and time limit.
Switch on the scooter then click on the ride button on your home screen and scan the QR code of your respective scooter.
Go through the "HOW TO RIDE" option on your app.
Evazu is operated within the radius of 5 km from the respective station.
Evazu encourages you to wear a helmet for your own safety.
It is compulsory to park Evazu at their respective station.
Evazu starts its ride from 8 o\'clock in the morning till 8 o\'clock in the evening.
You can ride a fully charged scooter for 25kms, before it can be used for riding again.
Minimum balance require is Rs. 6 for ______kilometer and than depends on time you ride.
No, you can\'t take Evazu in any mode of transport.
It is mandatory to one have their own device and account in order to rent Evazu.
The rider should not exceed the limit of 25km/hr.
In case of any unsuitable conditions of ride, Evazu scooter will automatically switch off.
In Evazu there is a dismantal alarm and GPS. In case you try to damage the property, you may be charged with penalty and legal actions will be taken.
Evazu is assisted with anti-theft alarm. In case someone will try to pick up the Evazu a continuous alarm will ring after every 5 minutes and location will be traced with the help of GPS.
